title: ldap-wizard: number of groups not displayed in group settings directly
body:
continue https://github.com/owncloud/core/issues/5881

i set the objectclass og groups and wait for 2 minutes, still 0 groups found.
if i go to the previous screen "login" and back, it takes 4 seconds to get number of groups.

still not importing any users, "configuration incorrect"

### owncloud.log
```
{"app":"user_ldap","message":"configuration error (prefix s01): login filter does not contain %uid place holder.","level":2,"time":"2013-11-21 12:36:40"}
{"app":"user_ldap","message":"configuration error (prefix ): login filter does not contain %uid place holder.","level":2,"time":"2013-11-21 12:36:40"}
```

## server configuration

ubuntu 12.04.3 lts
apache/2.2.22 (ubuntu)
mysql ver 14.14 distrib 5.5.32
php 5.3.10-1ubuntu3.8

owncloud 6.0 beta 5 (daily) 21.11.2013
